Research_direction:
1. 纤维增强复合材料的力学性能和失效机理，包括准静态、冲击、疲劳方向
2. 连续介质损伤力学、粘聚力单元、扩展有限元等有限元损伤和断裂分析方法
3. 机械CAD/CAE
Projects: Chen Wang, Xiwu Xu, An extended phantom node method study of crack propagation of composites under fatigue loading, Composite Structures, v154, p410-418, October 2016（SCI二区）Chen Wang, Xiwu Xu, Cohesive element analysis of fatigue delamination propagation in composite materials with improved crack tip tracking algorism, Composite Structures, v134, p176-184, December 2015（SCI二区）Chen Wang, Xiwu Xu, A new hybrid element analysis for exponentially varying FGM based on an asymptotic stress field, Acta Mechanica Solida Sinica, v27, n3, p315-330, June 2014（SCI四区）
